name: Raw Beats
description:
A metal drummer tired of touring decides to become a grill master. He uses his drummer skills to quickly prepare delicious foods following the beats of the music.

Play using the classical Nokia keyboard:

Left fire
Middle fire
Right fire
Either of 1,4,7
Either of 2,5,8Either of 3, 6, 9

In order to score the points the foods must be removed on the beat where the count goes to 0.

A game by JiTaYa games developed for the 5th Nokia Jam. Music by Rich Machines.

Assets used: https://poloviiinkin.itch.io/food-and-drink
